name: Toybox
docstring: The Toybox namespace is the top-level namespace for the Connect IQ SDK. It contains all the modules and classes that are available to Connect IQ apps.

name: Toybox.Weather
docstring: The Weather module provides functionality for accessing information related to the current weather.

parameters.name: location
parameters.docstring: Location to get the sunrise information

parameters.name: date
parameters.docstring: date to get the sunrise information

parameters.name: location
parameters.docstring: Location to get the sunset information

parameters.name: date
parameters.docstring: date to get the sunset information

name: Toybox.WatchUi
docstring: The WatchUi module contains user interface elements available within apps.  WatchUi provides several classes that represent Views, or what is displayed on the screen of a device. Also available are UI elements like on-screen menus, progress bars, buttons, and various pickers. More abstract classes represent all drawable objects, such as bitmaps and text.

constants.Name: ANIM_TYPE_EASE_IN
constants.Description: Animation that increases in speed from start to end

constants.Name: ANIM_TYPE_EASE_OUT
constants.Description: Animation that decreases in speed from start to end

constants.Name: ANIM_TYPE_EASE_IN_OUT
constants.Description:
Animation that increases in speed from the start, then decreases in
speed toward the end

constants.Name: CLICK_TYPE_HOLD
constants.Description: A press and hold on the screen

constants.Name: CLICK_TYPE_RELEASE
constants.Description: A release of a hold on the screen

constants.Name: MAP_MARKER_ICON_PIN
constants.Description: The default Garmin map marker pin icon

constants.Name: SWIPE_UP
constants.Description: A swipe in the upward direction

constants.Name: SWIPE_DOWN
constants.Description: A swipe in the downward direction

constants.Name: ANALOG_CLOCK_STATE_RESTING
constants.Description: Set the clock hands to resting position

constants.Name: ANALOG_CLOCK_STATE_SYSTEM_TIME
constants.Description: Set the clock hands to system time

constants.Name: ANALOG_CLOCK_STATE_HOLDING
constants.Description: Set the clock hands to the specified position

constants.Name: MENU_THEME_DEFAULT
constants.Description: The default theme color as specified by the device.

constants.Name: NUMBER_PICKER_TIME_OF_DAY
constants.Description: A Duration representing the number of seconds since midnight

NumberPickerMode.tags: This enum may be removed after System 3.

constants.Name: SLIDE_LEFT
constants.Description: The View slides to the left.

constants.Name: SLIDE_RIGHT
constants.Description: The View slides to the right.

constants.Name: LAYOUT_VALIGN_TOP
constants.Description:
Set a Drawable object's locY property to this to align it to the top
edge of the device context (

constants.Name: LAYOUT_VALIGN_BOTTOM
constants.Description:
Set a Drawable object's locY property to this to align it to the
bottom edge of the device context (

constants.Name: LAYOUT_VALIGN_CENTER
constants.Description:
Set a Drawable object's locY property to this to center it vertically
in the device context (

constants.Name: LAYOUT_VALIGN_START
constants.Description:
Set a Drawable object's locY property to this to make it equal to
its parent's locY property.

constants.Name: LAYOUT_HALIGN_LEFT
constants.Description:
Set a Drawable object's locX property to this to align it along the
left edge of the device context (

constants.Name: LAYOUT_HALIGN_RIGHT
constants.Description:
Set a Drawable object's locX property to this to align it along the
right edge of the device context (

constants.Name: LAYOUT_HALIGN_CENTER
constants.Description:
Set a Drawable object's locX property to this to center it horizontally
in the device context (

constants.Name: LAYOUT_HALIGN_START
constants.Description:
Set a Drawable object's locX property to this to make it equal to
its parent's locX property.

constants.Name: ANIMATION_EVENT_COMPLETE
constants.Description: Indicates the completion of an animation.

constants.Name: ANIMATION_EVENT_CANCELED
constants.Description: Indicates the cancel of the animation playback

constants.Name: ACTION_MENU_THEME_DARK
constants.Description: Dark theme for the action menu

constants.Name: ACTION_MENU_THEME_LIGHT
constants.Description: Light theme for the action menu

parameters.name: object
parameters.docstring: The object to animate

parameters.name: property
parameters.docstring: The Symbol of the object's property to animate (e.g. :locX, :locY, etc.)

parameters.name: type
parameters.docstring: A WatchUi.ANIM_TYPE_* value

parameters.name: start
parameters.docstring: The starting value of the property

parameters.name: stop
parameters.docstring: The ending value of the property

parameters.name: period
parameters.docstring: The duration of the animation in seconds

parameters.name: callback
parameters.docstring: A Method to call when the animation is complete; this can be `null`

parameters.name: resource
parameters.docstring: An identifier for a resource defined in the project's `resources.xml` file

parameters.name: callback
parameters.docstring: Callback to invoke when the review token request has completed.

parameters.name: transition
parameters.docstring: A WatchUi.SLIDE_* value

throws.docstring: Thrown if called from background, data field, glance, or watch face app; or of called from the base page of a widget

parameters.name: view
parameters.docstring: View to push

parameters.name: delegate
parameters.docstring: The input delegate to handle input for the View

parameters.name: transition
parameters.docstring: A WatchUi.SLIDE_* value

throws.docstring: Thrown when view is type [MapView](../Toybox/WatchUi/MapView.html) and the visible map area parameters are invalid

Thrown if called from background, data field, glance, or watch face app; or if the new view is a [DataField](../Toybox/WatchUi/DataField.html), a [GlanceView](../Toybox/WatchUi/GlanceView.html), or a [WatchFace](../Toybox/WatchUi/WatchFace.html)

parameters.name: menu
parameters.docstring: An action menu object.

parameters.name: delegate
parameters.docstring: An action menu delegate object.

parameters.name: text
parameters.docstring: The text to display in the notification toast.

parameters.name: options
parameters.docstring: A Dictionary of options.

dictionary_keys.name: :icon
dictionary_keys.docstring: The icon to display with this notification. If no icon is provided and the system requires an icon for a toast, the app icon will be used.

parameters.name: token
parameters.docstring: The token that passed as a parameter to a successful call to ReviewResponseCallback.

parameters.name: view
parameters.docstring: The View object to push

parameters.name: delegate
parameters.docstring: The input delegate to handle input for the View

parameters.name: transition
parameters.docstring: A WatchUi.SLIDE_* value

throws.docstring: Thrown if called from background, data field, glance, or watch face app; or of called from the base page of a widget and the new view is native; or if the new view is a [DataField](../Toybox/WatchUi/DataField.html), a [GlanceView](../Toybox/WatchUi/GlanceView.html), or a [WatchFace](../Toybox/WatchUi/WatchFace.html)
